timeline.message:
Fix QuantityType.format timezone bug

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

timeline.bodyText: Can we make the UTC ZoneId static?
timeline.author: cweitkamp

replies.bodyText: There isn't a constant for it in the ZoneId class. But we can use ZoneOffset.UTC which is a constant and sub-class of ZoneId.
replies.author: wborn

timeline.message:
Use ZoneOffset.UTC constant

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>
